title: Using the Text Editor Widget
description: Learn how to format and style text content using Elementor's Text Editor widget.

blocks.content: The Text Editor widget is your go-to tool for adding and formatting text content in Elementor. Master its features to create engaging content.

Essential formatting options:

  • Basic text formatting (bold, italic, underline)
  • Paragraph styling
  • Lists and indentation
  • Text alignment
  • Links and anchors

Take advantage of advanced features:

  • Custom typography
  • Drop cap
  • Column count
  • Text wrapping
  • Custom CSS classes

author: admin
